description:
**Tool Overview**:

The Administrative Templates (.ADMX) for Windows 11 2024 Update (24H2) are a set of configuration files used with Group Policy to manage Windows settings across an enterprise environment.

**Details**:
This tool provides a structured way to deploy and configure various policies within a Windows environment. The templates enable system administrators to set user and computer settings by applying specific configurations, which can enhance system security and performance. 

1. Download the .ADMX files from the provided link to utilize them in your Group Policy Management Console.
2. Deploy these templates to your Active Directory to apply settings across multiple systems in your network.
3. Ensure that the correct version of Windows 11 is installed to make full use of these templates and settings.
